items.title: Published my article site build with Gatsbyjs
items.description: Launched a personal blog using modern JAMstack architecture. Implemented static site generation, responsive design, and optimized for SEO.

items.title: Finished first MVP of passion project Project Name
items.description: Successfully delivered the minimum viable product for a side project focused on productivity tools. Implemented core features including user authentication, data persistence, and real-time updates.

items.title: Acquired a desk in workspace to start my own setup
items.description: Invested in a dedicated workspace to improve productivity and work-life balance. Set up ergonomic desk, dual monitors, and professional equipment.

items.title: Awarded Top 7 badge for having at least one post featured in the weekly "must-reads" from Dev.to
items.description: Recognized for technical writing contributions to the developer community. Article on microservices architecture was featured among the top weekly picks.

items.title: Started working as MERN Stack Developer at Acme Lab
items.description: Joined a dynamic startup as a full-stack developer. Responsible for building scalable web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. Led development of multiple client projects.

items.title: Completed the freeCodeCamp.org Responsive Web Design Certification
items.description: Successfully completed comprehensive web development certification covering HTML5, CSS3, responsive design principles, accessibility, and modern layout techniques including Flexbox and CSS Grid.
